Tampa.WTMP (AM):
WTMP is a radio station serving the Tampa Bay, Florida region broadcasting on 1150 AM. The station is licensed to Neal Ardman of NIA Broadcasting, Inc.


== Station history ==
WTMP currently plays urban adult contemporary in the Tampa Bay area on frequencies 1150 kHz and FM 96.1, though its program has changed over the station's 57-year tenure. Its main urban competitors are WBTP and WRXB. Its target audience are listeners between the ages of 25-54 and is the current home of the Tom Joyner Morning Show.
